title: [Large-Scale] Language Problem-Solving Proficiency Enhancement Course Through Collaborative Inquiry Learning Models

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and simple problem-solving experience
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment utilizing personalized learning devices and collaborative tools (online forums, real-time document editors), with problem-solving scenarios tailored to language domains (foreign languages/Korean).

learning_goals: Learners can apply the four-stage inquiry-based collaborative learning model (question setting → data collection → analysis → solution proposal) to solve language-related problems.
Learners can assess their metacognitive abilities through peer feedback and develop improvement plans.
Learners can use digital collaboration tools to produce structured reports and presentation materials for team-based inquiry results.

resources: Language Problem-Solving Scenario Kit (Based on Real-World Job Cases)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
